code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 37 YO white male database administrator presents with 8 months history of Kidney. Patient is a moderate drinker he denies smoking o:Height 65 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis.
